CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 19, 1945, pg. 1, reads: "Artist Wins Award - Mozelle Thompson, son of Mr. and Mrs. Mozelle Thompson Sr., of Schenley Avenue, won a scholarship to Parson's School of Design in New York City this week. He also received awards for water color paintings and costume designing in the National Scholastic Art Contest. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Artist Mozelle Thompson seated at drawing table in interior with telephone in background
